name: storra
author: Bastian Krol
description: a generic stand-alone document store with a RESTful interface which can be configured to use different storage engines (MongoDB (not yet), nStore, node-dirty, ...), all encapsulated behind the same CRUD/REST API
comment_devDependencies: jasmine-node 1.2.x needs to be installed but prefers to be installed globally which is not possible via package.json
